title: Sepp Kuss returns as kingmaker at the Tour de France: ‘The Giro was ideal preparation’
content:
Just six weeks after he piloted Primož Roglic to the pink jersey, Kuss is making his presence felt in Jumbo-Visma's yellow jersey quest.

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss returns as kingmaker at the Tour de France: ‘The Giro was ideal preparation’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
